mapper.sql: role_id as "roleId", role_name as "roleName", data_scope as "dataScope", tenant_id as "tenantId", permission as "permission", is_sys as "isSys", status as "status", create_by as "createBy", create_time as "createTime", update_by as "updateBy", update_time as "updateTime", remarks as "remarks"
mapper.select: select r.role_id as "roleId", r.permission as "permission" from sys_role r, sys_user_role ur where r.role_id = ur.role_id and ur.user_id = #{userId}
